snippet: President Christian Wulff refused to let a newspaper publish a transcript of his threatening phone call to its editor.
abstract: President Christian Wulff of Germany, one day after a televised interview in which he promised greater openness and transparency, refuses to allow the country’s biggest-selling newspaper Bild to publish a transcript of a threatening voice mail message he left for its editor Kai Diekmann.
lead_paragraph: President Christian Wulff refused to let a newspaper publish a transcript of his threatening phone call to its editor.

headline.seo: German President Christian Wulff Blocks Publication of Threatening Call
